data.comment: The big names in today's match at Luminus Arena have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 24, Paul Onuachu scores to make it 1-0 at Luminus Arena.
Great play from Bryan Heynen to set up the goal.
Alessandro Albanese, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Danel Sinani is the substitute for Waasland-Beveren.
The first-half has come to a close in Genk.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Aboubakary Koita.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 50, Dries Wuytens (Waasland-Beveren) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
John van den Brom is making the team's first substitution at Luminus Arena with Kristian Thorstvedt replacing Patrik Hrosovsky.
The home team have replaced Gerardo Arteaga with Bryan Limbombe. This is the second substitution made today by John van den Brom.
In the minute 81, Michael Frey is booked for the away team.
John van den Brom (Genk) is making a third substitution, with Cyriel Dessers replacing Paul Onuachu.
Daan Heymans (Waasland-Beveren) gets a yellow card.
Joe Efford is on a sub for Michael Frey for Waasland-Beveren.
Jur Schryvers is replacing Jenthe Mertens for Waasland-Beveren at Luminus Arena.
